about_the_game:
Enter the captivating world of "Ink of Fate" and help Helena rewrite her destiny! In this intriguing 3D puzzle and narrative adventure video game, you will dive into the mysteries of books, where the protagonist, Helena, finds herself trapped in a story written by a mysterious author.

HELP HELENA REWRITE HER STORY

Discover the moving story of Helena, who with willpower and a burning desire to overcome, seeks to emerge victorious from the conflicts imposed on her by her own author. Join her on her journey to change a predetermined destiny, exploring the power of ink and defying the limitations imposed by written words.

STYLIZED ARTISTIC STYLE

The artwork in "Ink of Fate" is stylized and carefully designed to emulate the texture of paper, creating a unique and immersive visual experience.

3D EXPLORATION AND 360° CAMERA SWIVELING

Embark on an exciting odyssey through gridded scenarios, where freedom of exploration is combined with the ability to rotate the camera 360°, revealing secrets hidden in every corner.

LEVELS AND COLLECTIBLE

Collect essential book pages to complete each level, unlocking new story chapters. Discover hidden levels full of secrets and rare collectibles that add depth to your gameplay experience, challenging even the most intrepid players.

INNOVATIVE PUZZLES

Explore engaging challenges as you solve intriguing puzzles and discover unexpected surprises. These puzzles invite you to enjoy strategic thinking, providing an exciting and fun experience on your journey.

INK MECHANICS

Explore the fascinating mechanics of ink, a central feature that drives your progress in Ink of Fate. Use ink in clever ways to solve puzzles, open secret doors and discover hidden corners of the book world.

CONFRONTS POWERFUL ENEMIES

Face inky creatures and defeat colossal bosses as you make your way through the story. Develop unique strategies to defeat your opponents and discover the truth behind your destiny.

SURROUND SOUNDTRACK

Immerse yourself even more in the experience with a captivating soundtrack that accompanies every step of your journey, intensifying the excitement and immersion in this world of wonders.

Discover your destiny and unleash the power of ink in "Ink of Fate". Are you ready to rewrite the story?

name: Ink of Fate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 480/AMD Radeon 7870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660/AMD RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Explore the world of books, discover its secrets and collect every page in Ink of Fate. A narrative 3D puzzle game in which you will help Helena, a half elf who embarks on a journey to rewrite her destiny and avoid the tragic end imposed on her by her author.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
